name: Pinky Ball Dark Ages PRO
description:
Guide Pinky Ball in this amazing game of unexpected dangers.

Save your Princess from evil Dragon which is protected by his army of dragons fighting with them in all areas of game.

Us all power up that you pick up in them game to reach next level and get closer to Princess.

How to Play:
- Use buttons to move and jump
- Pick up all power ups in game to defeat dragon
- Collect coins in game.
